entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 6.
